body:
Comment 5: 
You don't think it's worth putting a comment somewhere? This has come up a number of
times, many of whom think using os.Stat is the right way to do it.

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12518876/how-to-check-if-a-file-exists-in-go
https://golang.org/issue/1312
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10510691/how-to-check-whether-a-file-or-directory-denoted-by-a-path-exists-in-golang
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/golang-nuts/TiskIM23rMI
http://golang-examples.tumblr.com/post/46579246576/check-if-file-exists
https://www.socketloop.com/tutorials/golang-check-if-a-file-exist-or-not
